content: I'm thinking of getting a laptop with an Intel Core i5 or i7 processor, as I want to ensure smooth performance for gaming and other resource-intensive tasks. I've been looking at some options from Acer, Lenovo, and HP, but I'm not sure which one to choose. Can you help me compare these laptops and recommend one that fits my budget and gaming needs? By the way, I've been using my Belkin wireless charging pad for my S22 Ultra, and it's been working great.
